metaTitle: Our Christmas Toy Product Range | The Christmas Elf
metaContent: Check out the full product range from Christmas Elf. We offer the ideal Christmas gifts, from Christmas Elf Sets to Christmas Elf Bags.

productsMain.title: Christmas Elf Set
productsMain.description: Your choice of a girl elf, a boy elf wearing shorts or a boy elf wearing a tunic.
productInfo: 1 elf(boy or girl) - you have the choice of a boy with shorts or with a tunic (please use drop down box to indicate your choice)
1 personalised letter from Father Christmas to explain to your child the purpose of the Elf's visit.

productsMain.title: Christmas Eve Bags
productsMain.description: Christmas Eve bags containing lots of goodies to keep your child occupied on the special night

productsExtra.title: Elf Doors
productsExtra.description: How can your Elf get in and out of the house? A magic door.

productsExtra.title: Craft Bags
productsExtra.description: Keep little one's occupied this Christmas making their own Christmas bag.

productsExtra.title: Personalised Keepsake Santa Plate
productsExtra.description: Santa & the reindeers will love their Christmas Eve treats served on this fabulous keepsake.

productsExtra.title: Nice Certificate
productsExtra.description: Who's been naughtly or nice? Nice Certificate showing childs name

productsExtra.title: Elf Finger Puppets
productsExtra.description: Set of 4 finger puppets containing 2 boy and 2 girl elves

productsExtra.title: Santa's Special Key
productsExtra.description: If you haven't got a chimney you need Santa's special key

productsExtra.title: Bendy Elf
productsExtra.description: Choose from a boy or girl elf or take a full set of 4

productsExtra.title: Reward Chart
productsExtra.description: A great way to keep your child motivated throughout December.
